name: CLMTE – Ecommerce Integration
author: CLMTE

sections.description:
CLMTE Ecommerce Integration adds a checkbox to the WooCommerce checkout page which allows your customers to carbon offset their purchases. By linking your organisation with our plugin, CLMTE provides a solution for carbon offsetting your buissness.

Required Plugins

This plugin requires WooCommerce to be installed and active to work.
sections.installation:
1. Download the clmte plugin
  2. Upload the clmte-folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Fill in your organisation details under WooCommerce->Settings->CLMTE
sections.faq:
How do I get my API Key and Organisation ID?

First, go to CLMTE.com and create or log in to your organisation account. Under “Api Details” you will be able to copy your API Key and Organisation ID

Where do I fill in my Organisation Details?

Under WooCommerce->Settings, there is a tab called CLMTE. Click on it and you should see two fields named “API Key” and “Organisation ID”.
